data.title: New Center for Psychoanalysis
data.text:
Contact Information:

E-mail: (no permission to view this data)

Languages spoken: French

Disclaimer — Member profile information is provided directly by members. NCP has not verified the accuracy of this information.

Practice Information:

Areas of Practice: Intimacy and Sexuality; Depression and Mood Disorders; Relationship Issues; Creative Blocks; Narcissistic Personality; Anxiety Disorders; Grief and Loss

Years in Practice: 20 or more

Populations Served: Older Adults; Adults; Adolescents; Couples

Bio/Background:

With over 40 years of clinical experience, I provide an analytic space that is both contemporary and flexible. I practice both Psychoanalysis and Psychoanalytic Psychotherapy on the Westside of LA and online if necessary. If you would like to know more about the difference between therapy and analysis, please reach out. I have contributed to professional psychoanalytic literature including publishing three books and over 60 articles, essays and book chapters. I also have 30 years of experience in analyzing and supervising clinicians in the field of mental health. In 2016 I was named Faculty of the Year at the New Center for Psychoanalysis. And in 2020 I was awarded Distinguished Psychoanalytic Educator by the International Federation of Psychoanalytic Educators (IFPE).

If you are curious, creative & motivated to look inward & reflect on your personal experience, keep reading! Perhaps you struggle with disturbances in your self-esteem, feel overly self-critical, perfectionistic &/or have difficulties sustaining long-term intimate relationships. Maybe it’s hard telling the story of your life experience & you might struggle with dependency issues that bring about guilt & shame as well as unsatisfying relationships. You find you aren’t as successful professionally & financially as you imagined your potential to be. You might wonder if there is something in the way & you want to understand why...

I invite you to tell your stories in a safe and comfortable ambiance without judgement or agenda. My style promotes curiosity about what might impede or inhibit your aspirations for success and emotional fulfillment. Through creative collaboration we will uncover and discover new ways of relating to signifiant individuals in your life that will help you feel more alive.

Reaching out and asking for help can be a difficult endeavor. Realizing this, I want to make our consultation as conversational and comfortable as possible. Those I work with find that I am flexible, relaxed, accepting and easy to talk to. If you think we might be a good fit, please reach out so we may set up some time for a complimentary phone consult.

Back to profile
